title: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa 2 (Tawawa on Monday Two)
synopsis: The anime follows a salaryman who has a chance meeting with a girl named Ai on the train. They begin to meet every Monday on the train, with the man serving as her bodyguard on the crowded commute while they chat.
voices: ['Harada, Sayaka', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Majima, Junji', 'Takumi, Yasuaki', 'Takahashi, Rie', 'Ishigami, Shizuka', 'Yanagita, Junichi', 'Iguchi, Yuka', 'Inoue, Kikuko']
staff: [['Ogawa, Yuuki', ['Director']], ['Aketagawa, Jin', ['Sound Director']], ['Kamoshida, Hajime', ['Series Composition']], ['Himura, Kiseki', ['Original Creator']]]
